trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event to provide custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: È possibile gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>evento per fornire un ordinamento personalizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento si verifica solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>non è impostata e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è impostata su `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento si verifica una volta per ogni coppia di celle della colonna da ordinare.

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica solo quando l'utente fa clic sull'intestazione di una colonna con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore della proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, o quando si chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName>rapporto di overload.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando si verifica questo evento per una colonna con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore della proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, è necessario visualizzare l'icona di ordinamento tramite la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo evento per ordinare le righe utilizzando i valori di cella in una colonna o più colonne.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>confrontare i valori delle celle nella colonna specificata nella proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>proprietà per accedere ai valori in altre colonne tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>insieme.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The column to sort.
trans-unit.target: Colonna da ordinare.

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della prima cella da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della seconda cella da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the first cell.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga contenente la prima cella.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga contenente la seconda cella.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della prima cella da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene in genere utilizzata in combinazione con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della prima cella.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della seconda cella da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene in genere utilizzata in combinazione con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della seconda cella.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la colonna da ordinare.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è utile per determinare e controllare il comportamento di ordinamento nel livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> to sort.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> da ordinare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice della riga contenente la prima cella da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è utile quando si ordinano le righe in base ai valori delle celle in più colonne.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga contenente la seconda cella.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice della riga contenente la seconda cella da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è utile quando si ordinano le righe in base ai valori delle celle in più colonne.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: Indice della riga contenente la seconda cella.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica l'ordine in cui verranno ordinate le celle confrontate.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Impostando questo valore viene in genere l'ultima operazione eseguita in un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: In genere si imposta questo valore per il valore restituito di un metodo di confronto, ad esempio <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.
trans-unit.target: Minore di zero se la prima cella viene ordinata prima cella della seconda; zero se la cella prima e seconda hanno valori equivalenti. maggiore di zero se la seconda cella viene ordinata prima della prima cella.
